commit 124c9b682651610c3d31059186401f5342a9ddcd
Author: Eric Harney <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Oct 24 12:56:21 2013 -0400

    libvirt: Support snapshot creation via libgfapi
    
    Currently, the libvirt driver only handles volume snapshot
    creation for file-backed volumes.
    
    This changes allows volume snapshot creation for libgfapi-
    attached volumes to work.  (A sufficiently new version of
    libvirt is required.)
    
    Implements: blueprint libvirt-volume-snap-network-disk
    Closes-Bug: 1288976
